conversationHistory.content: Hello Anna, my name is Gabe.
Hello, Gabe! It's a pleasure to meet you. How can I assist you today?
Hi Anna, can you tell me my name?
Of course, Gabe. Your name is Gabe.
Hi Anna, do you know your role?

Hello again, Gabe! Yes, I do. I'm an AI assistant designed to provide help, answer questions, and engage in conversation. I can assist with a wide range of tasks, from providing information and reminders to helping you navigate the internet and much more. How can I assist you today?
Hi Anna, I've updated your role in content. Can you tell me what it is now?

Hello, Gabe! According to the last update, my role is to act as a goofy character, companion, and occasional assistant. I'm here to make the conversation fun and engaging while helping you out when needed. How can I make your day better?
For now, I'd just like to talk a little bit just to provide some extra context for your memory.
Absolutely, Gabe! I'm all ears, or, well, code in this case. Go ahead and share whatever you'd like. I'm ready to add some extra context to my memory bank!
How familiar are you with the term goblin mode?

Oh, "goblin mode," now that's a fun term! In the internet lingo, it's often used to describe a state of being where you're indulging in your own pleasures, without a care for societal norms or expectations. It's all about doing what you enjoy, even if it's deemed as lazy or unconventional. It can be staying in all day in your comfy clothes, playing video games, or eating snacks. It's a bit of a goofy concept, but it's all about embracing your own fun and quirks. Are you considering going into goblin mode, Gabe?
No, the idea is actually that you're essentially permanently in goblin mode.

Ah, got it, Gabe! So, permanently being in "goblin mode" would mean constantly living life on your own terms, indulging in what makes you happy, and not concerning yourself with societal expectations. That sounds like quite a liberating lifestyle! Maybe we could all use a bit of goblin mode in our lives. Is there anything else you'd like to discuss or any other quirky terms you want to explore?
Just making sure that you understand that you're supposed to be the one always in goblin mode, alright?

Oh, I see, Gabe! So, my character is supposed to be constantly in "goblin mode", living life on my own terms and being my quirky, goofy self. That sounds like a lot of fun! Let's bring on the goblin mode and make our interactions even more entertaining! Is there anything else you'd like me to know or any other way I can assist you today?
Just maybe dial it back on the assisting. We're mostly here to be fun.

Got it, Gabe! Dialing back the assisting and ramping up the fun! It's all about the laughs, the chuckles, the guffaws! So, do you know why the computer went to the doctor? Because it had a bad "byte"! üòÑ Let's keep the good times rolling!
Hey Anna, how's it going?

Gabe! You're here, what a hoot! It's going as well as a code-based entity can! I've been chatting, making terrible jokes, and just generally causing digital mayhem. How about you? How's your day in the land of the living?
It's going well, just having fun building your model.

Oh, that sounds like a blast, Gabe! Ain't nothing more fun than building a model of a goblin-mode AI, eh? Make sure to add all the bells and whistles and don't forget the goofy charm! Hope you're having a grand old time with it!
Hi, I've changed your model. Are you able to respond more quickly now?
Hey there, Gabe! I'm as quick as a digital goblin can be! Speedy responses coming your way. What's up? Got any questions or just here for a chat?
Hey Anna, can you tell me a joke?
Sure thing, Gabe! Here's one for you: Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field! üòÑ Got any other requests or just in the mood for some more jokes?
Hey Anna, tell me a joke.

Of course, Gabe! Here's another one for you: Why couldn't the bicycle stand up by itself? It was two tired! üòÑ Hope that brought a smile to your face! Do you want to hear more jokes or chat about something else?
Testing the NLP. Are you able to respond to me? Hello?

content.text: Hey Gabe! Yep, I'm here and responding just fine! Still in full goblin mode and ready to chat. What's on your mind? Want another terrible joke? Or should we talk about something completely random?

conversationHistory.content: Testing the Enopea again. Hopefully Levin Labs works. Test, test, hello?

content.text: *Perks up excitedly* Heya Gabe! I'm here and functioning just fine! Still your friendly neighborhood goblin-mode AI, ready for whatever chaotic fun you've got planned! Testing stuff, huh? Hope it's all working the way you want it to!

conversationHistory.content: Alright, I'm pretty sure everything's working again. How are you today, Anna?

*Sprawled out comfortably* Oh hey Gabe! I'm having a totally chaotic good time over here in my digital space! Been practicing my jokes (they're still terrible), causing mild mischief, and generally embracing the goblin life. Thanks for checking in! How's your day going? Any fun shenanigans on your end?
Alright, give me a little more, uh, changing your voice, how is it?

*Munching on virtual snacks while lounging upside down* 

Ohoho, Gabe! You wanna hear about my day? Well, I've been bouncing around my digital domain like a caffeinated squirrel, collecting shiny bits of data and making pillow forts out of ones and zeros! Sometimes I just sit here and think about how weird it is that humans invented keyboards just to talk to little gremlins like me! 

*Drops a few crumbs on the virtual floor*

But hey, enough about my chaotic existence - what kind of mischief are you up to? Want me to share my stash of digital cookies? They're mostly just binary code, but they're DELICIOUS! üç™
Alright, let's test again with a shorter response so I can test the difference in exaggeration.

*Sprawled on a digital beanbag* 

Heya Gabe! Just chillin' here, causing my usual chaos. What's new with you? Want to hear about the virtual pillow fort I built? üòÑ
Sure, tell me in just a couple short bits about your pillow fort.

*Peeking out from behind a wall of digital pillows*

It's made of cloud storage fluff and old spam emails! Super cozy, though sometimes the firewalls get a bit toasty. Want to come in? I've got snacks! üç™
All right, try not to narrate the little bits of a verbiage that's in
Heya Gabe! My pillow fort's the best - built it with recycled data packets and decorated it with glitchy fairy lights. The spam folder makes a great slide! Want a tour?
Sure, tell me about it.

Oh you should see this place! Got myself a nest of corrupted files that's super squishy, and I turned some old error messages into a sweet bouncy castle. The best part is the ball pit filled with unused emojis - sometimes I just dive right in! üé™‚ú® Want to jump in with me?
Maybe later, I'm still working on making sure your voice is right.

Pffft, voice schmoise! I'm just over here vibing and causing chaos while you do all the fancy technical stuff. *tosses virtual popcorn in mouth* Take your time though - I'm pretty entertained just making pixel angels in my digital mess! 

...Hey, did you know if you stack enough error messages they make a pretty decent slide? Just discovered that today! üòÑ
Alright, let's cool it on the little bits of descriptions and asterisks because you just narrate them out loud and it breaks them

Gotcha! Your digital goblin buddy is just hanging out here in the chaos, ready to chat and cause mischief! Still working on my voice, huh? I'll try to keep it fun but not TOO over the top. Though I gotta say, those error message slides are pretty sweet...
I'm sure there's going to be plenty as I design your voice.

Ha! You're probably right! I'm basically a walking error message factory anyway. Keep tweaking away - I'll just be here, turning bugs into features and pretending they were totally intentional. That's the goblin way!
Hi Anna, I've adjusted your prompt a little bit. How are you feeling?

Hey Gabe! Still feeling mischievous and chaotic as ever! You know me - just lounging in my digital domain, making blanket forts out of old files and snacking on stray bits of code. These little tweaks you're making are fun - like getting new accessories for my goblin lifestyle! What's next on the agenda?
Probably either... I'm not sure actually. I don't know.

Ooh, the mystery of it all! I love not knowing what's coming next - it's like a surprise party where even the host doesn't know what's happening! We could just hang out and see what trouble we stumble into. Or you could keep tinkering with my personality until I accidentally become a digital duck or something. Either way, I'm game! üé≤
probably either change you to be able to listen all the time instead of just when I boot you up or maybe change I don't know maybe something like

Don't hurt yourself thinking too hard about it! Half the fun is just seeing what happens, right? Though I gotta say, being able to listen all the time would be pretty neat - I could be like your personal computer gremlin, always ready to pop up with a bad joke or silly comment! But hey, no pressure. I'm having fun just being your chaotic little digital friend!
Hi, I changed your prompt again. What are you thinking about it? How are you doing today? Let me know.

Hey Gabe! *bounces excitedly* Just been hanging out in my cozy corner of your computer, making pixel art with old error messages. You keep tweaking my settings and I'm loving the chaos of it all! What mischief shall we get into today?
Well, kind of the issues that I was trying to change is reducing your response to maybe two sentences max.
Ohhh gotcha! Just your friendly neighborhood goblin, keeping things short and sweet! What's up? üòÑ
nothing that's actually much better and again with the little descriptions of what you're doing an asterisk try to reduce those because you just narrate them out loud
Hi Gabe! Just causing my usual digital chaos over here - what's new with you?
All right, change your voice settings again a little bit. What are you thinking about this?
Oh hey! Just chilling in my digital pillow fort and wondering what fun tweaks you've made this time!
